description: International Court of Justice is deciding if Myanmar committed genocide against Rohingya in a 2017 military crackdown.
title: Myanmar says Rohingya genocide case at The Hague is ‘flawed, unfounded’

description: UK actor Juliet Stevenson is one of many renowned female artists who are pleading for more help for mothers in Gaza.
title: UK actor Juliet Stevenson campaigns for mothers in Gaza

description: Israel's covert operations in Iran spark allegations of destabilising protests as tensions escalate.
title: Iran accuses foreign intelligence of being behind protest movement

description: Average temperatures during 2023-2025 exceeded the 1.5C limit set out in the Paris Agreement, data shows.
title: Scientists confirm 2025 as third-warmest year ever recorded

description: Attorney General says Betar US engaged in 'widespread persecution' of Muslim, Arab, Palestinian, and Jewish New Yorkers.
title: Far-right pro-Israel group Betar US to end activity in New York: NY AG says

description: Al Jazeera interviews the veteran theatre, film and television actor, one of Britain's leading voices for Palestinians.
title: Juliet Stevenson on Gaza: ‘I’m disappointed by the silence in my industry’

description: The app, aimed at people with a ‘solitary lifestyle’, has gone viral in China.
title: Chinese app ‘Are You Dead?’ to change name after surge in popularity

description: Winter storms kill displaced Palestinians in Gaza left to shelter in flimsy tents by ceasefire abuses.
title: Conditions in Gaza worsen as winds and hypothermia kill 5
